Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-8096 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-8096 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.8.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-8096
